SELECT r.* ,COALESCE(TO_CHAR(ROUND(rv.avg_rating, 1)), '0') AS avg_rating FROM ( SELECT
FROM room r ORDER BY r.views DESC ) r LEFT JOIN ( SELECT room_id ,AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM review GROUP BY room_id ) rv ON r.room_id = rv.room_id WHERE ROWNUM <= 4 AND r.roomstat_code = 'rst03'

SELECT
,COALESCE(ROUND(s.avg_rating, 1), 0) AS avg_rating FROM room r INNER JOIN (SELECT room_id ,ra.avg_rating AS avg_rating FROM ( SELECT room_id ,AVG(rating) AS avg_rating ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AVG(rating) DESC) rn FROM review GROUP BY room_id ) ra WHERE rn <= 4 ) s ON r.room_id = s.room_id WHERE roomstat_code = 'rst03'

SELECT
,bct.cnt ,ROUND(COALESCE(rv.avg_rating, 0), 1) AS avg_rating FROM room r INNER JOIN ( SELECT bc.room_id ,bc.cnt FROM ( SELECT room_id ,COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM booking GROUP BY room_id ) bc WHERE ROWNUM <= 4 ) bct ON r.room_id = bct.room_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT room_id ,AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM review GROUP BY room_id ) rv ON r.room_id = rv.room_id WHERE r.roomstat_code = 'rst03'
